titleStmt.title: The prodigals resolution: or, My father was born before me. To a pleasant mew [sic] tune.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for F[rancis]. Coles, T[homas]. Vere, J[ohn]. Wright, and J[ohn]. Clarke,
